sentences.en: Albino seedling is the typical chlorophyll - deficient mutation in plants.
sentences.cn: 植物白化苗则是一种典型的叶绿素合成缺陷突变体.

sentences.en: All are structurally similar to chlorophyll a of plants.
sentences.cn: 它们的结构都与植物体叶绿素a的结构相似.

sentences.en: Chlorophyll is produced by the action of light on the plants'leaves.
sentences.cn: 光对植物的叶子发生作用从而产生叶绿素.

sentences.en: Fish Gelatin, Glycerol , Essential oil of orange, Copper Chlorophyll.
sentences.cn: 鱼类明胶, 甘油, 香橙精华, 铜叶绿素.

sentences.en: Gelatin, Glycerol , Essential oil of orange, Titanium dioxide, Copper Chlorophyll.
sentences.cn: 明胶, 甘油, 香橙精华, 二氧化钛, 铜叶绿素.

sentences.en: Inhibition of chlorophyll synthesis may be caused by etiolation, mutant blocks, or streptomycin.
sentences.cn: 叶绿素合成可以由黄化 、 突变性阻塞或链霉素而引起.

sentences.en: It is precisely because many of the leaves contain chlorophyll is green.
sentences.cn: 正因为叶子含有许多叶绿素才是绿色的.

sentences.en: Leaf nitrogen content induces remarkable effect on chlorophyll and soluble protein content.
sentences.cn: 叶片氮含量对叶绿素与可溶性蛋白含量会产生明显的影响.

sentences.en: The chlorophyll in wheatgrass also helps to purify the liver.
sentences.cn: 麦草中的叶绿素同样可以帮助净化肝脏。

sentences.en: The colorants of green plants consist of chlorophyll, xanthophyll and carotene.
sentences.cn: 绿色植物中含有叶绿素 、 叶黄素和胡萝卜素.

sentences.en: The disease causes varying degrees of destruction of the chlorophyll.
sentences.cn: 这一病害使叶绿素遭到不同程度的破坏.

sentences.en: The function of magnesium in the chlorophyll structure is well known and documented.
sentences.cn: 镁在叶绿素结构中的功能,早已为人们清楚地阐明,且也得到文献记载.

sentences.en: The green stuff on the occasional freak potato chip is chlorophyll.
sentences.cn: 洋芋片上偶尔会出现绿色的诡异部份,其实那是叶绿素?

sentences.en: The manufacture of chlorophyll in plants is activated by sunlight.
sentences.cn: 植物中的绿叶素是在日照的条件下开始产生的.

sentences.en: The structure of the chlorophyll molecule is known . It consists ofporphyrin.
sentences.cn: 叶绿素的分子结构已经搞清, 它是由卟啉组成的.

sentences.en: This could be estimated at 1000 litres of hydrogen for 330 grams of chlorophyll per day whereas for example colza produces roughly only 1000 litres of oil per hectare . . .
sentences.cn: 这种农场每天估计能够产生1000升氢气，而且只消耗330克叶绿素； 而比如种植菜籽，每公顷土地才能产生大约1000升油。

sentences.en: This peak appeared before the fast degradation of chlorophyll and protein.
sentences.cn: 该峰出现在叶绿素和蛋白质快速下降之前.

sentences.en: Wheatgrass has antibiotic properties and is packed with chlorophyll as it is a plant.
sentences.cn: 麦草含有抗生素，由于它是一种植物，所以含有许多叶绿素。
